title: SSVC display at the VolksWorld Show

posts.content:
When: 02nd and 3rd April 2016

Where: Sandown Park, Esher. KT10 9AJ

Website: http://www.volksworld.com/volksworld-show

The Volskworld Show is nearly upon us yet again, which means another club display….. So I am looking for buses to show in the line-up. If you own a nice, shiny, clean bus your club needs you! Buses can be shown the whole weekend or just Saturday or just Sunday, it's your call. You will receive a free ticket for you and the occupants of your bus (but don’t take the Michael!!) for the whole weekend . Buses can be removed from the club line up each evening to camp in if you wish to do so. This year the organisers have requested that we put together a display of clean shiny splits (15 only so get on it!!), so if you have a bus that matches this criteria you need to get a picture of it to me, including your name and registration number. Please mail these details direct to: r.james @ wintoncapital. com (don't copy and paste this email add as I have added spaces to stop spam).

Also I am organising the usual "not so shinny" or "anything goes" line up, just outside the main entrance, again if you own a bus that suits this line up please support your club and get involved!

All the best and see you at the show

Regards Rikki (07802 884 583)

Please don't just add your self/bus to this list as I need to see it first!!


Interior Line up list:

1. Jason bond - 1962 Devon - 353 TKK
2. Gary Yeo - ??? (pending on pictures)



Exterior line up:

Rikki James - 1954 Samba
Scotty - 1952 combi
